intro_arc.title: First Lessons
intro_arc.intro: A mushroom companion warns that the forest will shred an unprepared traveler. With basic white magic, a level 1 fighter can stand a chance.
intro_arc.notes: These quests build a team strong enough to seek the moving Ancient Tower rumored to align with the moon.

portal_arc.title: Portal Advances
portal_arc.intro: The portal no longer opens by level alone. Prove stability through quests to unlock new continents.
